message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.  What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your counter.  I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still looking to keep my spending within my budget. Could we perhaps agree on $12,500?
